subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: If there is a youth movement on the L.P.G.A. Tour, this may be the best sign: Paula Creamer is considered the best player never to have won a major, and she is only 21.
snippet: If there is a youth movement on the L.P.G.A. Tour, this may be the best sign: Paula Creamer is considered the best player never to have won a major, and she is only 21.
